TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ColorConvertedBitmapExtension extends System.Windows.Markup.MarkupExtension

summary.span: Implements a markup extension that enables creation.

span.span: Implements a markup extension that enables creation.

summary.span: A does not have an embedded profile, the profile instead being based on source and destination values.

span.span: A does not have an embedded profile, the profile instead being based on source and destination values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別是標記延伸實作。This class is a markup extension implementation. 標記延伸類別存在主要是為了提供基礎結構支援的某些層面[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)][!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]處理器實作中，與標記延伸模組所公開的成員不通常稱為從使用者程式碼。Markup extension classes exist mainly to provide infrastructure support for some aspect of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processor implementation, and the members exposed by a markup extension are not typically called from user code. 此延伸模組支援[ColorConvertedBitmap 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md)使用量[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。This extension supports the [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md) usage from [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## XAML 文字使用方式XAML Text Usage 針對[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ColorConvertedBitmap 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md)。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] information, see [ColorConvertedBitmap Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/colorconvertedbitmap-markup-extension.md).
